snippet: The American Chestnut Foundation is trying to find a blight-proof line of American chestnuts and use them to restore woodlands to onetime Appalachian coalfields.
abstract: The American Chestnut Foundation is trying to find a blight-proof line of American chestnuts and use them to restore woodlands to onetime Appalachian coalfields.

headline.main: Coaxing American Chestnuts Back to Appalachia
